document.masterDocTitle: A subjective global checklist of the extant non-marine Ostracoda (Crustacea)

mods:titleInfo.mods:title: A subjective global checklist of the extant non-marine Ostracoda (Crustacea)

subSubSection.paragraph:
Syn.:

(fide G.W. Müller 1912 )

Nom. nov. pro

nec Chapman, 1934 (fossil species)

: NT, PA, PAC

: PA

(non sensu Sars 1925 ; =
C. hartwigi
)

Syn.:

(non Kaufmann, 1900 ) (fide Meisch 2000 )

Syn.:

(fide Meisch 2000 )

*

: AT, AU, NA, NT, OL, PA, PAC

)
